snippet.title: Love Colors: Paint with friends | Coming to Nintendo Switch & PC on September 17th!
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1561060/Love_Colors_Paint_with_Friends/
Wishlist on Switch:
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/love-colors-switch/

Wash-off your brushes, dust off your easel and get ready to channel your inner Bob Ross. Vixa Games is proud to announce Love Colors, the paint by numbers pixel art game is coming to PC & Switch this fall.
